/** @format */ import React from 'react' import Navbar from './Components/Navbar/Navbar' import Intro from './Components/Intro/Intro' import './App.css' import Services from './Components/MyService/Services' import Experience from './Components/Experience/Experience' import Works from './Components/Works/Works' import Portfolio from './Components/Portfolio/Portfolio' import Testimonials from './Components/Testimonials/Testimonials' import Contact from './Components/Contact/Contact' import Footer from './Components/Footer/Footer' import { useContext } from 'react' import { themeContext } from './Context' function App() { const theme = useContext(themeContext) const darkMode = theme.state.darkMode return (
) } export default App
